Text:
Verry good ! 

I think you are the first person to upload something from Themeforest. There isn't really someone who uploads from neither ThemeForest or the in general the entire Envato network...

Come on people, i'm going in with all the files i have bought tomorrow or around that time.. So please, join me and TheSpark here and go in with your files !

Yes, I saw there was at least no other ThemeForest templates on the pirate bay.  Frankly, I find that as a shocker.

If you have any please do upload, I look forward to seeing them.

Great job. Any chance we might end up seeing a green theme from themeforest here? 
I'm just a wordpress newbie and can't find the right template.
Cheers!
